com.fmi.calculation.text. DO NOT MODIFY SETTINGS BELOW

DynamicTemplateString.SourceText: REPLACE "qrText" below with text, a field, or a calculation

DynamicTemplateString.SourceText: Package Includes:Tables:Layouts:Scripts: getQRCode; The QR Code will automatically display in the Web Viewer. To save the image, call this script and then set a container field to Get ( ScriptResult ).
DynamicTemplateString.TargetText: Package Includes:Tables:Layouts:Scripts: getQRCode; The QR Code will automatically display in the Web Viewer. To save the image, call this script and then set a container field to Get ( ScriptResult ).

DynamicTemplateString.SourceText: 1. In Layout Mode, open the Web Viewer Setup. Set the variable qrText to the text for the QR Code.2. Resize the QRCode group to the appropriate size for the layout. The QR Code will automatically adjust to the size of the Web Viewer.
DynamicTemplateString.TargetText: 1. In Layout Mode, open the Web Viewer Setup. Set the variable qrText to the text for the QR Code.2. Resize the QRCode group to the appropriate size for the layout. The QR Code will automatically adjust to the size of the Web Viewer.
DynamicTemplateString.Comment: com.fmi.layoutobject.text.1. In Layout Mode, open the Web Viewer Setup. Set the variable qrText to the text for the QR Code._CR/__CR/_2. Resize the QRCode group to the appropriate size for the layout. The QR Code will automatically adjust to the size of the Web Viewer.

DynamicTemplateString.SourceText: /********* HEADER **********Purpose: Get the QR Code as a fileParameter: Addon UUIDOptionalResult:resultgif image container dataVersion:3/7/2021createdNotes: After calling this script, set container field to Get ( ScriptResult )********** HEADER *********/

DynamicTemplateString.SourceText: DON'T WANT TO CALL EVERYTIME IT LOADS
DynamicTemplateString.TargetText: DON'T WANT TO CALL EVERYTIME IT LOADS
DynamicTemplateString.Comment: com.fmi.scriptstep.text.DON'T WANT TO CALL EVERYTIME IT LOADS

DynamicTemplateString.SourceText: WHEN IS VIEWER READY FOR COMMANDS?
DynamicTemplateString.TargetText: WHEN IS VIEWER READY FOR COMMANDS?
DynamicTemplateString.Comment: com.fmi.scriptstep.text.WHEN IS VIEWER READY FOR COMMANDS?

DynamicTemplateString.SourceText: WebViewer does not seem to be using suspend and resume
DynamicTemplateString.TargetText: WebViewer does not seem to be using suspend and resume
DynamicTemplateString.Comment: com.fmi.scriptstep.text.WebViewer does not seem to be using suspend and resume

DynamicTemplateString.SourceText: FOR TRUE (THREADED? PROMISE?) SEND A SCRIPT TO CALL ONCE COMPLETE...OR ENTER A PAUSE AND USE THE JS CALL TO UNPAUSE?
DynamicTemplateString.TargetText: FOR TRUE (THREADED? PROMISE?) SEND A SCRIPT TO CALL ONCE COMPLETE...OR ENTER A PAUSE AND USE THE JS CALL TO UNPAUSE?
DynamicTemplateString.Comment: com.fmi.scriptstep.text.FOR TRUE (THREADED? PROMISE?) SEND A SCRIPT TO CALL ONCE COMPLETE..._CR/_OR ENTER A PAUSE AND USE THE JS CALL TO UNPAUSE?

DynamicTemplateString.SourceText: GET SCRIPT RESULT IS THE RESULT OF THE JS CALLED SCRIPT, if it's fast enough?
DynamicTemplateString.TargetText: GET SCRIPT RESULT IS THE RESULT OF THE JS CALLED SCRIPT, if it's fast enough?
DynamicTemplateString.Comment: com.fmi.scriptstep.text.GET SCRIPT RESULT IS THE RESULT OF THE JS CALLED SCRIPT, if it's fast enough?
